easierchests.config.tt.largechests: Allow chests to have more than 54 entries
easierchests.config.tt.halfsize: Half button size unless mouse hovers over them
easierchests.config.tt.transparent: Make buttons transparent unless mouse hovers over them
easierchests.config.tt.highlight: Hex colors, 2 bytes each: transparency, red, green, blue
easierchests.config.tt.enablesearch: Enable the search box to find items by name
easierchests.config.tt.enablecolumnbutto: Enable the arrows above and below chest/inventory
easierchests.config.tt.enablerowbuttons: Enable the arrows left of the chest/inventory
